meta.name: RTHK 香港電台
meta.about: RTHK (Radio Television Hong Kong) is the sole public service broadcaster in Hong Kong, providing radio, TV and Internet multimedia services to the public. 香港電台是香港唯一的公共廣播機構，提供電台、電視及網上多媒體服務。
meta.single_line_address: 30 Broadcast Drive, Kowloon, Hong Kong 香港九龍廣播道三十號

meta.name: RTHK 香港電台
meta.about:
歡迎瀏覽香港電台 YouTube 頻道。 
香港電台是香港唯一的公營廣播機構，提供電台、電視及網上多媒體服務。

如對節目有任何查詢或意見，請以電郵聯絡香港電台：ccu@rthk.hk
任何內容包括粗言穢語、欺凌或騷擾、侮辱、色情、私隱、非法活動或廣告推廣等評論，將會被刪除。 

Welcome to RTHK Official YouTube Channel.
Radio Television Hong Kong (RTHK) is the sole public broadcaster in Hong Kong, providing radio, TV and Internet multimedia services to the public. 

If you have any enquiries or opinions related to RTHK programmes, please contact RTHK via email : ccu@rthk.hk
Any posting of comments with foul languages, bullying and harassment, abusive and insulting, pornography, privacy, illegal activities or advertisement, etc will be removed.
